extendedInfo.description: Do you feel hard to focus? This app can help you train to focus, give you attention fitness. Make the plan and follow the training cycle, you can find it's easy to focus! Through some training you will get a longer attention span, It's very simple and useful, why not try it ?:)**NOTATION**:You can get the bug fixed version in http://codeand.me This version has a bug in vibrate, please don't use the vibrate. Sorry for this bug.

reviews.title: Simple, works... don\'t use the buzzer!
reviews.comment: Simple, simple app... but still useful to help keep you focused. The vibrating reminders are **from hell**, though-- don\'t use them. My Desire Z would vibrate *constantly* when the time ran out. Exiting, killing the app, even *uninstalling* it didn\'t stop the crazy buzzing! Thankfully, a reboot exorcised the demons. Reinstalled the app, and am happy enough with it now, using the audio-only notifications.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says on the box. It vibrated way too much tho (htc sapphire)
reviews.author: A Google User
